code: @Override public void process(K k, final Context context, Iterable<T> input, Collector<R> out) throws Exception {     T curr = null.     for (T val : input) {         if (curr == null) {             curr = val.         } else {             curr = reduceFunction.reduce(curr, val).         }     }     this.ctx.window = context.window().     this.ctx.context = context.     windowFunction.process(k, ctx, Collections.singletonList(curr), out). }
@Override public void clear(final Context context) throws Exception {     this.ctx.window = context.window().     this.ctx.context = context.     windowFunction.clear(ctx). }

@Override public void open(Configuration configuration) throws Exception {     FunctionUtils.openFunction(this.windowFunction, configuration).     ctx = new InternalProcessApplyWindowContext<>(windowFunction). }
@Override public void setRuntimeContext(RuntimeContext t) {     super.setRuntimeContext(t).     FunctionUtils.setFunctionRuntimeContext(this.windowFunction, t). }
